judges: Before Bell,. Musmanno, Jones and Cohen, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The decree of the Court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Rahauser of the Orphans’ Court of Allegheny County, costs to be borne by the appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Clyde P. Bailey, with him John L. Bailey, John A. Byerly, Jr., and Weller, Wicks and Wallace, for .appellants.
Joseph F. Weis, with him Weis <6 Weis, for appellee.
